Text.Text_Ko: 긴급 상황이야. 이번에는 신속히 괴물을 물리쳐야겠어.
Text.Text_En: This is an emergency. We need to defeat the monster quickly this time.

Item.Text_Ko: 이번에는 좀 더 쉬운 일이면 좋겠네.
Item.Text_En: I hope this one is easier.
Is it another mosquito to deal with?

Text.Text_Ko: 이번에는 모기는 아니야. 뿔이 달린 박쥐처럼 생긴 괴물이 도시 한복판에 출몰했어.
Text.Text_En: This time it’s not a mosquito. A monster that looks like a bat with horns has appeared in the middle of the city.

Item.Text_En: Are these kinds of monsters common?
A bat is better than a mosquito.

Text.Text_Ko: 이런 괴물들이 지구에 나타나기 시작한 것은 몇 십년 전부터야.
Text.Text_En: These kinds of monsters started appearing on Earth a few decades ago.
All because of those damn bastards...
...Anyway, let’s handle this well like last time.
